scripts.csv:spec-85285: node scripts/gen-json.js --file spreadsheets/spec85285.csv --colWidth 6 --shareGroupFiles --productGrouping half --outFile contents/_shared/spec85285.json --outFile2 templates/json/spec85285.json
scripts.csv:eclipse: node scripts/gen-json.js --file spreadsheets/eclipse.csv --colWidth 12 --shareGroupFiles --productGrouping third --outFile contents/_shared/eclipse.json --outFile2 templates/json/eclipse.json
scripts.csv: npm run csv:stocked-products && npm run csv:spec-85285 && npm run csv:eclipse
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run csv && npm run generate
scripts.sync-test: cp test-robots.txt output/robots.txt && aws --profile aerocoat s3 sync output/. s3://test.aerocoat.com/ --exclude "*Suppliers*" --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers && rm -f output/robots.txt
scripts.sync: aws --profile aerocoat s3 sync output/. s3://www.aerocoat.com/ --exclude "*Suppliers*" --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers
